name: Snowball Token
description: Snowball is a deflationary smart token that utilises the snowball effect in their marketing whilst rewarding holders passively.They are developing utility platforms on the BSC, including the Snowcial media app that pays users to browse a TikTok like social media interface. Snowball are also creating an all in one app interface that will feature an NFT market place, the Snowswap exchange, cash back rewards and a wallet for low market cap coins.
